description: 1 x Birch, 1 x Sycamore (applicant's ref. T3, T26) - Thin crown(s) by 25% and Crown clean as specified. Standing in area A23 of Tree Preservation Order;1 x Oak (applicant's ref. T4) - Shorten one low lateral approx. 2.5-3m and Crown clean as specified. Standing in area A23 of Tree Preservation Order;1 x Cedar (applicant's ref. T5) - Reduce crown spread on side facing flats by up to 2m and Crown clean as specified. Standing in area A23 of Tree Preservation Order;2 x Cedar, 1 x Oak, 2 x Pine, 2 x Sycamore, 1 x Plane (applicant's ref. T5A, T5B, T6, T6A, T7, T9, T9A, T20) - Crown clean as specified. Standing in area A23 of Tree Preservation Order;1 x Birch (applicant's ref. T8) - Trim low foliage to clear car parking. Standing in area A23 of Tree Preservation Order;1 x Sycamore (applicant's ref. T18) - Reduce crown spread over boundary 30% as specified. Standing in area A23 of Tree Preservation Order;1 x Box Elder (applicant's ref. T22) - Reduce crown by up to 1.5m to clear as specified. Standing in area A23 of Tree Preservation Order;Group of Holly (in the Group of Holly and Laurel (excluding 2 x Holly trees) - behind the block containing flats 101-110) - Reduce top by approx. 1-1.5m. Standing in area A23 of Tree Preservation Order
